function SectionCandidateRecentActivities() { return ( <>

Recent Activities

    {appliedJobs.length > 0 ? ( appliedJobs.map((apply, index) => (
  • Your job for {apply.jobTitle} has been applied on {new Date(apply.appliedAt).toLocaleDateString()}.
    • )) ) : (
  • No recent applied jobs.
    • )}
) } export default SectionCandidateRecentActivities;
